questions.questionText: Which of the following tag represents a generic document or application section in HTML5?
questions.explanation: section' tag represents a generic document or application section. It can be used together with h1-h6 to indicate the document structure.

questions.questionText: Which of the following tag represents a section of the document intended for navigation in HTML5?
questions.explanation: 'nav' tag represents a section of the document intended for navigation.

questions.questionText: Which of the following input control is used for input fields that should contain a value from a range of numbers in Web Form 2.0?
questions.explanation: 'range' input control is used for input fields that should contain a value from a range of numbers.d

questions.questionText: Which of the following tag automatically focus one particular form field in HTML5?
questions.explanation: This is a simple one-step pattern, easily programmed in JavaScript at the time of document load, automatically focus one particular form field.

questions.questionText: Which value of Socket.readyState atribute of WebSocket indicates that the connection has not yet been established?
questions.explanation: A value of 0 indicates that the connection has not yet been established.
